page.title: 17GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: GAMES CHILDREN PLAY 2 At home children play games suitable for fewer people.{WAR}is a favourite,using pretend guns;it is not so rough as fighting. Ball games like {CRICKET},{ROUNDERS}, {TENNIS }are popular with older children.{SWINGS}and{CLIMBING FRAMES } are enjoyed,too. Alot of children play board games like {SORRY},{SCRABBLE},{MONOPOLY},{CLUEDO}, {FRUSTRATION},{THE GAME OF LIFE},{ {CONNECT-4}.Games using pencil and paper are {NOUGHTS AND CROSSES}and{ {HANGMAN}.Computer games are readily available,and played in most homes.Girls often prefer to play with dolls or to play schools.Boys like to play with construction sets like{LEGO} they enjoy making up their own models, and the {TECHNIC LEGO}enables them to make complicated working models.
